title: I need help, my pixel the audio isn't working all the apps that needs to have audio will not respond
content: I need help, my pixel the audio isn't working all the apps that needs to have audio will not respond. Can't play any videos in any apps even video chats or phone calls is not working. Please help me on what is the resolution on this cause i did safe mode and it is all working But if NOT in the safe mode the issue is still present. I factory reset my phone as in reset everything but on going issue. Thanks in advance for the answer.
